00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup DAC_example DAC
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup Sync_12bit_2CH
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #define CHANNEL0_OUT_MILLI_V        (1650)       /* 1.65V                                                   */
00047 #define CHANNEL1_OUT_MILLI_V        (1650)       /* 1.65V                                                   */
00048 
00049 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /* DAC use Synchronous mode 12-bit resolution,
00051    DAC1 data is located at DAC0DHR[27:16], DAC0 data is located at DAC0DHR[11:0]
00052    if DAC use Synchronous mode 8-bit resolution,
00053    DAC1 data is located at DAC0DHR[15:8], DAC0 data is located at DAC0DHR[7:0]                              */
00054 #define CHANNEL0_CONV_DATA          (CHANNEL0_OUT_MILLI_V * 4095 / 3300)
00055 #define CHANNEL1_CONV_DATA          (CHANNEL1_OUT_MILLI_V * 4095 / 3300)
00056 #define CH_CONV_DATA_ALL            ((CHANNEL1_CONV_DATA << 16) | (CHANNEL0_CONV_DATA))
00057 
00058 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 void DAC_Configuration(void);
00060 
00061 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00062 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00063   * @brief  Main program.
00064   * @retval None
00065   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00066 int main(void)
00067 {
00068   DAC_Configuration();
00069 
00070   /* DAC0 channel 0, 1 conversion start                                                                     */
00071   DAC_Cmd(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH0, ENABLE);
00072   DAC_Cmd(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH1, ENABLE);
00073 
00074   /* Set the DAC0 channel 0 holding value                                                                   */
00075   DAC_SetData(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH0, CH_CONV_DATA_ALL);
00076 
00077   while (1);
00078 }
00079 
00080 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00081   * @brief  DAC Configuration.
00082   * @retval None
00083   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00084 void DAC_Configuration(void)
00085 {
00086   {
00087   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00088   /* Enable peripherals clocks of DAC, AFIO                                                                 */
00089   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00090   CKCUClock.Bit.DAC0       = 1;
00091   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00092   }
00093 
00094   /* Config DAC pins function                                                                               */
00095   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_DAC0_CH0_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_DAC0_CH0_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_DAC0);
00096   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_DAC0_CH1_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_DAC0_CH1_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_DAC0);
00097 
00098   /* Configure the DAC Synchronous conversion mode                                                          */
00099   DAC_ModeConfig(HT_DAC0, SYNC_MODE);
00100 
00101   /* Configure DAC0 channel 0                                                                               */
00102   /* Configure the VDDA to DAC channel reference voltage                                                    */
00103   DAC_ReferenceConfig(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH0, DAC_REFERENCE_VDDA);
00104 
00105   /* Configure the 12-bit resolution to DAC channel                                                         */
00106   DAC_ResolutionConfig(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH0, DAC_RESOLUTION_12BIT);
00107 
00108   /* Provide DAC channel output with driver                                                                 */
00109   DAC_OutBufCmd(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH0, ENABLE);
00110 
00111 
00112   /* Configure DAC0 channel 1                                                                               */
00113   /* Configure the VDDA to DAC channel reference voltage                                                    */
00114   DAC_ReferenceConfig(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH1, DAC_REFERENCE_VDDA);
00115 
00116   /* Provide DAC channel output with driver                                                                 */
00117   DAC_OutBufCmd(HT_DAC0, DAC_CH1, ENABLE);
00118 }
00119

00127 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00128 {
00129   /*
00130      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00131      Debug message can be added here.
00132   */
00133 
00134   while (1)
00135   {
00136   }
00137 }
